items.name: red block
items.text: This block (a type of square (a type of basic shape)) is red ( a color (created by the scattering of light)).

items.name: blue block
items.text: This is a Block (blue) it is blue. (This one doesn't really exist. Don't ask.)

items.name: yellow block
items.text: Oh look! The Sun! Wait... No... That's just a yellow block.
